meanings.definition: A province or territory governed by an exarch.
meanings.sent1: The exarchate was a region ruled by the exarch.
meanings.sent2: The exarchate was known for its unique governance system.
meanings.sent3: In the exarchate, the exarch decided to paint all the buildings pink!
meanings.sent4: The exarchate stood as a beacon of stability in turbulent times.
meanings.sent5: The exarchate's borders were well-protected by the exarch.

meanings.definition: The office or rank of an exarch.
meanings.sent1: His dedication led him to achieve the exarchate.
meanings.sent2: The exarchate was a position of great responsibility.
meanings.sent3: Becoming the exarch was a dream come true for him.
meanings.sent4: The exarchate symbolized authority and leadership.
meanings.sent5: He aspired to reach the exarchate through hard work.

meanings.definition: The residence or jurisdiction of an exarch.
meanings.sent1: The exarchate was a grand palace where the exarch resided.
meanings.sent2: The exarchate was the center of all administrative decisions.
meanings.sent3: The exarch threw a party in the exarchate to celebrate his promotion.
meanings.sent4: The exarchate's gates represented the boundary of his authority.
meanings.sent5: Visitors were always impressed by the exarchate's opulence.
